page.title: 04ST. ERNEY CHURCH
page.content:
The church was built in 1245 and restored in 1872.It has three bells, one of which is 1500 years old. The congregation of about 50 comes from all over the area _ Saltash, Landrake, Hatt, Sheviok, etc. Because it is a country church, it is kept going by this outside congregation. {Church Services. Mattins _ 1st Sunday in the month Mattins and Holy Communion _3rd Sunday in the month.
{St Erney} itself is a unique piece of land between the Tiddy and the Lynher rivers and is surrounded by water except in one place. The area is conserved for its natural beauty and little has been changed there.
